import {React, useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Rating } from 'react-simple-star-rating' import { useCartUpdate } from '../../Contexts/CartContext' function ProductCardH(props) { const AddProduct = useCartUpdate().AddProduct console.log(props.product) return (

{props.product.Name}

{props.product.Price + " ₹"}

) } export default ProductCardH
